statements: SELECT * FROM schema_history;
SELECT id, changed_by, change_description FROM schema_history;
SELECT * FROM schema_history ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM schema_history WHERE changed_by = 'Alice';
SELECT id, change_date, changed_by, change_description FROM schema_history WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM schema_history WHERE change_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, change_description FROM schema_history WHERE changed_by = 'Admin' ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT changed_by FROM schema_history WHERE change_description LIKE '%update%' ORDER BY changed_by ASC;
SELECT id, changed_by, change_description FROM schema_history WHERE change_description IS NOT NULL AND changed_by <> 'User1' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT id, change_description FROM schema_history WHERE changed_by IN ('Admin', 'User2') AND change_description <> 'Initial setup' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM tracking_changes;
SELECT change_id, change_date, modified_table FROM tracking_changes WHERE change_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, modified_table, modification_type FROM tracking_changes WHERE modification_type = 'insert' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM authorized_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM authorized_users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM tracking_changes WHERE change_id = 100 ORDER BY change_date DESC, modified_table ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, change_id, modified_table FROM tracking_changes WHERE modification_type = 'update';
SELECT * FROM authorized_users WHERE role IN ('admin', 'manager', 'staff') ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT MAX(change_date) AS latest_change_date, COUNT(*) AS num_changes FROM tracking_changes;
SELECT username, email, role FROM authorized_users WHERE username LIKE '%smith%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY role DESC, username ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM authorized_users;
SELECT user_id, role FROM authorized_users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, table_modified, modification_time FROM schema_modification_log WHERE modification_type = 'Update';
SELECT change_description FROM tracking_changes_to_database_schema WHERE change_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM authorized_users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM authorized_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT id, change_description, change_date FROM tracking_changes_to_database_schema WHERE change_type = 'add';
SELECT * FROM schema_modification_log ORDER BY modification_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM tracking_changes_to_database_schema WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_modifications FROM schema_modification_log GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_modifications > 2;
SELECT * FROM schema_change_tracking;
SELECT table_name, change_type FROM schema_change_tracking WHERE change_type = 'INSERT';
SELECT table_name, change_type, change_date FROM schema_change_tracking WHERE change_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, username, action FROM user_activity WHERE action = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT role_name, permission_type, grant_date FROM permissions WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT id, table_name FROM schema_change_tracking ORDER BY table_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE action_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT role_name, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE grant_date < NOW();
SELECT id, action_taken, audit_date FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT username, action, action_date FROM user_activity WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND action = 'login';
SELECT * FROM audit_trail;
SELECT id, timestamp, user_id FROM schema_changes ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username FROM authorized_users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_access WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT change_id, COUNT(approved) FROM change_approval GROUP BY change_id HAVING COUNT(approved) > 0;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action FROM schema_changes WHERE table_name='audit_trail' AND action='UPDATE';
SELECT username FROM authorized_users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT id, timestamp, user_id FROM unauthorized_access ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT change_id, approver_id, approved FROM change_approval WHERE approved IS TRUE;
